noBurstEffect: Hint: No Burst effects active. Enable C1 and/or add <pyro>Pyro</pyro>, <electro>Electro</electro>, and/or <hydro>Hydro</hydro> teammates
c1Key: Additional Pyro, Electro, and Hydro members for Shrine of Maya's bonus

c2.bloomCondName: Opponent is marked by Seed of Skandha
c2.qasCondName: After triggering <spread>Quicken</spread> <aggravate>Aggravate</aggravate>, or <spread>Spread</spread> on the opponent marked by Seeds of Skandha
